From: Alice Chen <alice@example.com>
To: Bob Martin <bob@example.com>; Grace Patel <grace@example.com>
Subject: Design sync next week

Hi Bob and Grace,

Can we have a quick design sync next Friday at 15:30? If that doesn’t work I’m flexible in the morning.

Thanks,
Alice

From: Kamal Singh <kamal@example.com>
To: Dana Lee <dana@example.com>
Cc: Rita Gomez <rita@example.com>
Subject: Quarterly Budget Review Q3

Dear Dana,

Per finance policy, we need the Q3 budget review on 2024-07-10 at 11:00. Rita will join us.

Regards,
Kamal

From: Carlos Diaz <carlos@example.com>

Subject: Kick-off

Evelyn,

Let’s kick off the analytics project on 2 Aug 2024 at 09:00.

– Carlos

From: Sven Larsson <sven@example.com>
To: Marco Rossi <marco@example.com>; Tara Kim <tara@example.com>; Omar Haddad <omar@example.com>
Subject: Weekly stand-up

Team,

Our first weekly stand-up will be every Tuesday. Let’s start on 2024-09-03 at 10:30.

Cheers,
Sven

Want to grab coffee tomorrow around 08:00? Just a quick catch-up.

Nina

To: Board Members
Subject: RE: Fwd: Board Meeting Schedule

Good afternoon,

After several iterations, the board has agreed on the following:
• Main board meeting – 2024-10-15 at 14:00
Please mark your calendars.

Regards,
Sam

Thanks,
Grace
